content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map in these steps. The agent repeatedly attempted to supply and craft a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) but did not succeed because no Lab was available in the inventory and necessary sub-ingredients for Lab crafting were missing. Although existing smelting facilities were referenced—a furnace at position (5.0, 5.0) used for iron plate production and a copper furnace at position (–27.0, –60.0) used for copper plate production—these were not newly constructed structures.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors with get_entities:
  - Do not use unsupported keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) when calling get_entities. Follow the documented function signature.
  - Avoid passing positional arguments if the function does not accept any; this ensures proper invocation of the API.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Issues:
  - Verify that the Lab entity exists in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
  - When filtering entities (for example, labs), ensure that the returned result is an iterable (use an empty list as a fallback instead of None).
  - Confirm that all prerequisite components (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available in the required amounts before reattempting Lab crafting.

• Resource Production Verification:
  - Before crafting complex items like a Lab, validate that the processes for smelting and assembling intermediary components (iron plates, copper plates, etc.) are correctly set up and yield sufficient resources.
